attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Aretha the Sheep has fallen through the system. 

"Animal rescues are voluntary" say the coastguard - we must call upon Gordon Brown to lead the way and save this poor sheep.

for more details:
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1202260/Rescue-Aretha-sheep-waits-help-stuck-cliff-ledge.html

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
